c-0: ^I'm sorry to bother you, but I'm Revna. I am investigating the disappearances.

Information_1_2: ^Is there anything you can tell me that might help?
^Is there anyone that might have something against you?
^If there is nothing else, goodbye for now.

c-0: ^I'm not sure this will help, but I did see a torch in the forest the other night.
^No. I only saw the torch. This was the night before my child went missing.

c-1: ^I am just a simple farmer! I can't think of anyone... well...

c-0: ^I guess the Leatherworker, Sigrid, is quite new in town.
^That doesn't say much, but I'll talk to them.
